heading: Overcharged Aspect â€“ Diablo 4 Druid Legendary Aspect
content: Overcharged Aspect is a Druid Offensive Aspect that can be found by completing the Dungeon as well as from random enemy drops. After clearing the Dungeon for the first time the Aspect will be available in your Codex of Power. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. The damage dealt by the pulse is also dealt to the target that is Overloaded by , making it benificial even for single target.
